title: Pidcock Power: Megawatt Attack in Spain Showcases Soaring Self-Assurance
content:
Third overall in last year’s Vuelta a España and victorious on Sunday, Tom Pidcock is poised to hit a new level this year.

Read the full article at Pidcock Power: Megawatt Attack in Spain Showcases Soaring Self-Assurance on Velo.
author: sstokes
